005
006package gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.function.library;
007
008import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.DynamicContext;
009import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.ISequence;
010import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.MetapathConstants;
011import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.function.FunctionUtils;
012import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.function.IArgument;
013import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.function.IFunction;
014import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.IItem;
015import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.atomic.IBooleanItem;
016import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.atomic.IStringItem;
017
018import java.util.List;
019
020import edu.umd.cs.findbugs.annotations.NonNull;
021import edu.umd.cs.findbugs.annotations.Nullable;
022
023public final class FnStartsWith {
024
025  @NonNull
026  static final IFunction SIGNATURE = IFunction.builder()
027      .name("starts-with")
028      .namespace(MetapathConstants.NS_METAPATH_FUNCTIONS)
029      .deterministic()
030      .contextDependent()
031      .focusIndependent()
032      .argument(IArgument.builder()
033          .name("arg1").type(IStringItem.class)
034          .zeroOrOne()
035          .build())
036      .argument(IArgument.builder()
037          .name("arg2")
038          .type(IStringItem.class)
039          .zeroOrOne()
040          .build())
041      .returnType(IBooleanItem.class)
042      .returnOne()
043      .functionHandler(FnStartsWith::execute)
044      .build();
045
046  @SuppressWarnings("unused")
047  @NonNull
048  private static ISequence<IBooleanItem> execute(@NonNull IFunction function,
049      @NonNull List<ISequence<?>> arguments,
050      @NonNull DynamicContext dynamicContext,
051      IItem focus) {
052    IStringItem arg1 = FunctionUtils.asTypeOrNull(arguments.get(0).getFirstItem(true));
053
054    IStringItem arg2 = FunctionUtils.asTypeOrNull(arguments.get(1).getFirstItem(true));
055
056    return ISequence.of(fnStartsWith(arg1, arg2));
057  }
058
059  private FnStartsWith() {
060    // disable construction
061  }
062
063  /**
064   * Determine if the string provided in the first argument contains the string in
065   * the second argument as a leading substring.
066   * <p>
067   * Based on the XPath 3.1 <a href=
068   * "https://www.w3.org/TR/xpath-functions-31/#func-starts-with">fn:starts-with</a>
069   * function.
070   *
071   * @param arg1
072   *          the string to examine
073   * @param arg2
074   *          the string to check as the leading substring
075   * @return {@link IBooleanItem#TRUE} if {@code arg1} starts with {@code arg2},
076   *         or {@link IBooleanItem#FALSE} otherwise
077   */
078  public static IBooleanItem fnStartsWith(@Nullable IStringItem arg1, @Nullable IStringItem arg2) {
079    String arg2String = arg2 == null ? "" : arg2.asString();
080
081    boolean retval;
082    if (arg2String.isEmpty()) {
083      retval = true;
084    } else {
085      String arg1String = arg1 == null ? "" : arg1.asString();
086      retval = arg1String.startsWith(arg2String);
087    }
088    return IBooleanItem.valueOf(retval);
089  }
090}
